name: Thronehold
description: The great human capital city, a bastion of order and civilization. Stone walls protect the city, and the sounds of commerce and life echo through the streets.

name: Thronehold Gates
description: The outer gates of Thronehold, where new adventurers begin their journey. The great stone walls loom overhead, and the sounds of the city echo from within.

name: Thronehold Plains
description: Rolling grasslands surrounding the capital. Farmers work the fields, and travelers make their way along well-worn paths.

name: Silverweave
description: An ancient elven city built among the treetops of the Weeping Woods. Graceful bridges connect the platforms, and the city seems to grow from the forest itself.

name: Weeping Woods Outskirts
description: The edge of the ancient Weeping Woods, where the elven city of Silverweave can be glimpsed through the canopy. Strange whispers drift on the wind.

name: Weeping Woods
description: The deep heart of the ancient forest. The trees here are ancient and watchful, and dark things lurk in the shadows between the trunks.

name: Blackwood Forest
description: A dark, foreboding forest where sunlight rarely penetrates. Twisted trees and shadowy creatures lurk within.
